concepts.name: Student
definition: We have to know what person studies at this institute, so the system needs to keep track of them.
purpose: We have to know what person studies at this institute, so the system needs to keep track of them.

concepts.name: Module
definition: We have to know what modules exist, so the system needs to keep track of them.
purpose: We have to know what modules exist, so the system needs to keep track of them.

concepts.name: Course
definition: We have to know what courses there are, so the system needs to keep track of them.
purpose: We have to know what courses there are, so the system needs to keep track of them.

purpose.name: A complete course consists of several modules.Students of a course can enroll for any module that is part of the course.

relations.name: isPartOf
meaning: A module part of a complete course

relations.name: takes
meaning: A student takes a complete course

relations.name: isEnrolledFor
meaning: Students enroll for each module in the course separately
